No compounds found.
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-compounds', templateUrl: './compounds.component.html', styleUrls: ['./compounds.component.css'] }) export class CompoundsComponent implements OnInit { compounds = []; isLoading = true; errorMessage = ''; total = 0; ngOnInit(): void { // Simulate a short delay to mimic HTTP call setTimeout(() => { const mockData = { data: [ { "id": 1, "name": "Tin tetrachloride", "image": "https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/3/39/Tin%28IV%29-chlorid.svg", "description": "Tin(IV) chloride, also known as tin tetrachloride or stannic chloride..." }, { "id": 2, "name": "Nitrohydrochloric acid", "image": "https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/d/de/Aqua_regia.svg", "description": "Aqua regia is a mixture of nitric acid and hydrochloric acid..." }, { "id": 3, "name": "Sodium chloride", "image": "https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/7/7c/Selpologne.jpg", "description": "Sodium chloride, commonly known as salt..." }, { "id": 4, "name": "Calcium chlorohypochlorite", "image": "https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/4/43/Calcium_hypochlorite.png", "description": "Calcium hypochlorite is used for water treatment and as a bleaching agent..." }, { "id": 5, "name": "Methylammonium Iodide", "image": "https://www.ossila.com/files/1/0823/0287/files/methyl-ammonium-iodide-structure_240x196.png", "description": "Methylammonium halides are organic halides with a formula..." }, { "id": 6, "name": "Acetyl salicyclic acid", "image": "https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/6/67/Aspirin-skeletal.svg", "description": "Aspirin, also known as acetylsalicylic acid, is used to reduce pain..." }, { "id": 7, "name": "Ammonium", "image": "https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/fe/Ammonium-2D.svg/1200px-Ammonium-2D.svg.png", "description": "The ammonium cation is a positively-charged polyatomic ion..." }, { "id": 8, "name": "Sodium bicarbonate", "image": "https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/2/22/SodiumBicarbonate.svg", "description": "Sodium bicarbonate, commonly known as baking soda..." }, { "id": 9, "name": "Hydroxide", "image": "https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/b/b0/Hydroxide_lone_pairs-2D.svg", "description": "Hydroxide is a diatomic anion with chemical formula OH−..." }, { "id": 10, "name": "Sodium tetraborate", "image": "https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/f/f7/Borax_crystals.jpg", "description": "Borax is a hydrated borate of sodium..." } ], total: 30 }; this.compounds = mockData.data; this.total = mockData.total; this.isLoading = false; }, 1000); // simulate 1 second delay } }
